BLUEBERRY: An edible round berry, belonging to the cowberry group (Vaccinium sect. Cyanococcus), with flared crowns at the end, that turns blue on ripening.
GARLIC: A plant, Allium sativum, related to the onion, having a pungent bulb much used in cooking.
SESAME: A tropical Asian plant (Sesamum indicum) bearing small flat seeds used as food and as a source of oil.
